purpose: The email announces the call for papers for workshops at the ISSRE 2025 conference, which will take place from October 21-24, 2025, in São Paulo, Brazil. It highlights the importance of the ISSRE conference in the field of software reliability engineering and provides details about confirmed workshops that will be co-located with the conference. The email also outlines important deadlines for paper submissions and notifications, encouraging both industry practitioners and academic researchers to participate and share their ideas.

infos:
Subject: ISSRE 2025: Workshops Call for Papers (Deadline July 21)
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Wed, 25 Jun 2025 16:19:11 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
ISSRE (International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering) is
Workshops at ISSRE provide additional opportunities for collaborating
The following workshops are confirmed and will be co-located with
1) WoSAR: The 17th International Workshop on Software Aging and
2) ASSURE: The 10th International Workshop on Assurance for
3) IWSF & SHIFT: The 9th International Workshop on Software Faults & The
4) AISQ: The 2nd International Workshop on Advanced Intelligent Software
5) ReSAISE: The 3rd IEEE International Workshop on Reliable and Secure AI
6) HFSD: The 2nd International Workshop on Human Factors for Software
(NOTE: This date is only indicative; please check

work_name_candidates.evidence: 1) WoSAR: The 17th International Workshop on Software Aging and Rejuvenation
2) ASSURE: The 10th International Workshop on Assurance for Software-intensive Systems
3) IWSF & SHIFT: The 9th International Workshop on Software Faults & The
4) AISQ: The 2nd International Workshop on Advanced Intelligent Software
5) ReSAISE: The 3rd IEEE International Workshop on Reliable and Secure AI
6) HFSD: The 2nd International Workshop on Human Factors for Software
